description: This file declares external functions related to CA entity creation in a cryptographic or certification context, generated by ASN.1 tools, including licensing and copyright information.

methods.name: AnscCreateCAEntity
methods.description: Creates a CA entity handle with specified context, reserved handle, and certificate handle.

methods.name: AnscCreateCAEntityWithEncoding
methods.description: Creates a CA entity handle with specified context, reserved handle, encoded certificate data, and data length.
